alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:05PM CDT until July 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR HOLMES...SOUTHERN CARROLL...SOUTHERN LEFLORE AND EAST CENTRAL HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tchula, or 12 miles west of Black Hawk, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Howard around 715 PM CDT. Lexington around 725 PM CDT. Emory around 730 PM CDT. Franklin and Bowling Green around 735 PM CDT. Durant around 745 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include West, Morgan City and Cruger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
